quagga.input.subject: Bankruptcy Meeting - February 8th - 2:00 p.m. NY
quagga.input.body:
ISDA and the Bond Market Association are hosting a meeting on bankruptcy
reform on February 8 at 2:00 at the Bond Market Association offices in New
York.  The purpose of the meeting is to discuss strategy (to include or nor
include cross-affiliate netting) and technical modifications to netting
legislation.

Please advise if you will like to attend. -- Many thanks -- Stacy

Stacy Carey
Director North American Regulatory Policy
International Swaps and Derivatives Association
(202) 457-6545 ph
(703) 256-1833 fax
(917) 543-9622 cell
scarey@isda.org
